ECHS Recruitment 2025 - Apply Offline for 13 Female Attendant and Other Posts
Harshitha / All Government Jobs / Aug 23, 2025, 16:18 IST
 Ex-Servicemen Contributory Health Scheme
 13 Jobs |  Posted On : 23-Aug-2025 |  Goa |  Salary : 16,800 to 75,000




FOLLOW

The Ex-Servicemen Contributory Health Scheme (ECHS) has officially released the notification to fill the vacancies of 13 Officer In Charge, Dental Officer, Pharmacist, Nursing Assistant, Female Attendant, Safaiwala, and Chowkidar Posts. Interested applicants can use this opportunity to apply for these posts before the last date of application. Candidates who have completed their BDS, 10th pass, 12th, 8th, B. Pharm, D. Pharm, B.Sc Nursing, and GNM can apply for the ECHS Recruitment 2025. The interested applicants can apply in offline mode. Here we have mentioned the education details, age limit, selection process, application fee, salary, and how to apply for these posts before the deadline. The application dates have already begun.




If you are more interested in Government Jobs, candidates can also apply for jobs in Goa.

ECHS Recruitment 2025 Eligiblity Criteria:
Name of the Posts	Vacancies	Education
Dental Officer	03	BDS
Pharmacist	02	B. Pharm, D. Pharm
Nursing Assistant	01	GNM, B.Sc Nursing
Driver	01	10th pass
Safaiwala	02	08
Chowkidar	01
Officer in charge	01	Any Degree

ECHS Recruitment 2025 Age Limit:

The minimum age limit: 18 Years.
The maximum age limit: 45 Years.
Age relaxation is based on the Organisation's norms.

ECHS Recruitment 2025 Selection Process:

The selection process is based on the interview.

ECHS Recruitment 2025 Application Fee:

There is no application fee.

ECHS Recruitment 2025 Pay Scale:

The minimum salary: Rs. 16,800/- per month.
The maximum salary: RS. 75,000/- per month.
How to Apply for the ECHS Recruitment 2025:
Go to the official website.
Visit the ECHS Recruitment 2025 notification.
Read the instructions carefully and check the eligiblity criteria.
If you are eligible.
Gather all the required documents.
Send the documents to the mentioned address.

Address:

ECHS Cell, Stn HQ Panaji, Near Geeta Bakery, SV Road Panaji, Goa-403001.

Important Dates:

Starting date	22-08-2025
Closing date	28-08-2025

 

Official Notification	Click Here
